segments.text: Is everything ready for Billy ’ s birthday party ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I ’ Ve finished making the birthday cake and I ’ Ve put all the things on the table . Did you find the party hats ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I did . I ’ Ve put one on the table for each child . I put up the big “ happy birthday ” sign too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . Do you think we have enough for the kids to eat and drink ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sure of that . There ’ s enough food here to feed an army !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That birthday cake looks wonderful , but you haven ’ t put any candles on it yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks for reminding me . I ’ Ve prepared some party games for the children too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve brought a tape with lots of children ’ s songs on it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hopefully , that will keep everyone happy .
segments.speaker: S1
